physical_appearance: This is a white cheongsam that is sleeveless. There is a collar present as well. There are no visible tears on the exterior of the cheongsam. Near the hem of the cheongsam, there are black floral motifs present. The motifs run vertically down the dress, as well as horizontally around the dress. The piping of the cheongsam runs from the collar to its left side, just below its left arm hole.
sgcool_label_text: This is a sleeveless white cheongsam in knitted fabric that was wore by Mrs Lee In Tong in her younger days. There are floral motifs in black thread near the hemline of the cheongsam.
title_text: White cheongsam with black floral motifs
subject_terms_2: Qipao Ethnic costume Motifs Women's clothing
